name: Maze Game
description:
Maze is a classic maze/labyrinth puzzle game for kids and adults with challenges.It is very cool addictive game for kids, adults and every one.This Maze game has amazing graphics.

200 levels absolutely for free and every labyrinth is different. Gameplay is challenging and you can try your best skills in this maze game. You can control the board by accelerometer.

Labyrinth game
Maze 2018
Maze game
Teeter game
Maze game free
Ball game

Key Features
- 200 different labyrinths to pass.
- Offline game.
- Nice graphics.
- Smooth ball movement.
- Small game size.
- Easy mazes for kids and hard labyrinths for adults.
- Complete the target within time.

Download and Please don’t forget to Rate and Review.
